content: How many miles would a person travel if they walked for 2 hours at a speed of 3.5 miles per hour?

If a person walks for 2 hours at a speed of 3.5 miles per hour, they would travel a distance of 7 miles. This is calculated by multiplying the time spent walking (2 hours) by the walking speed (3.5 miles per hour). The formula is:

Distance = Speed × Time

So, Distance = 3.5 miles/hour × 2 hours = 7 miles
